title: The Case of the Blowing Whistle
description: Meet Penelope Barrows girl detective and her sidekick Ben Walters. Go with her on her perilous journey to solve The Case of the Blowing Whistle. Walk down the street with her while she is hiding in the shadows. Who is that girl with her hair flying in the wind? Where could she be going? Why is that whistle blowing? Delve into her world and discover the truth.
author: C.C. Beechum
